name: Vue.js
description: Vue is the primary web development framework I have used over the course of the years. I have used vue for 2 years with my internship and full time work with aWhere inc, and I created this website exclusively in vue.

name: Ruby
description: Ruby is my favorite scripting language. I worked with it to automate tasks during my internship at CGI and the Fikes Companies. It isn't my primary scripting language, but I have the most fun with it.

name: SQL
description: I have worked with both Microsoft SQL Server and Postgres SQL databases, both professionally and academically, for over 3 years.

name: JavaScript
description: As a full-stack engineer, I have developed and maintained many systems in javascript professionally, I have also re-made an entire API Developer portal site through Vue.js and raw JavaScript.

name: Java
description: Java is the first programming language I learned, as such I have been using it to many capacities including professionally since 2014.

name: DotNet
description: I have been using ASP.NET as well as many affiliated libraries for full-stack Web / REST API development as a software engineer for over a year and a half.

name: Python
description: Python was a primary language of use during my undergraduate study at UMHB. Similarly, on a research trip to Brno, Czech Republic, our research group used Python during our work at Red Hat for static code analysis.

name: C++
description: C++ was the language used to learn data structures and algorithms during my undergraduate study. I have used this for several projects during those years in undergraduate study.
